ValidationRule.description: Verify if owner is a queue and prevents editing if its true.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(ISCHANGED(OwnerId)), LEFT(OwnerId, 3) = '00G', OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'COMM_AffiliateRequest', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'COMM_PartnerRequest' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Record cannot be edited as long as it belongs to a queue Please assign to your self
